website_summaries.verdict: This deluxe travel case helps keep your vape accessories secure and organized.
pros: Nylon and suede construction delivers the perfect combination of style and function
Includes a handy carabiner so you can conveniently clip the case onto your belt or backpack
Offers ample space for e-juices, wicks, wires, batteries and other vape accessories
cons: Velcro to close the case tends to wear down quickly
Bulky in comparison to similar cases

customer_reviews.title: Kudos on the case:
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product I was in a hurry, thought I was buying a vaporizer or whatever it’s called and not caring case. I had it tended to send it back but but some components they had a local store because I was dying to try and my Amazon order is in the mail. I can see where the case is very handy as there are so many part, so I’m keeping it. Thanks for your inquiry, I have to say kudos on the case.

customer_reviews.title: Holds EVERYTHING a vaper needs when away from their primary home kit.
customer_reviews.text: This little case rocks! I just recently had to travel from Fort Worth TX to Eureka CA and I bought this clever little carrier for the trip. It held my Topside Dual w/ my Profile atty with a custom drip tip, a 30 ml bottle of my fav vaping juice along with 4 18650 batteries inside the main compartment. The outside pocket held my mini screwdriver, A small pair of scissors, a pair of tweezers, pure cotton (of course) an extra set of mesh coils and the forming tool for the coils. This case held it all. It covered every need I had bought it for. Don't hesitate. Buy it! You won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: John Gangemi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Vape Case
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other cases, most are too small, but I love this one because it holds everything, keeping it all organized. The case is tough, made with strong material that lasts and, it’s not bulky. More great features is that it can be attached to belts and bags, and has a (detachable) shoulder strap. My Vape Case for Travel holds two Juul, a power bank, charging cord, and pods. This product is everything they say it is.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift idea and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this item as a gift for my sister in law. She is always looking for her Vape stick in her pocketbook which is a jungle. This item is very well made and I am sure will be a greatly appreciated gift!
customer_reviews.author: D. Earnest

customer_reviews.title: fits my aegis legend 200w well, material is great
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly the picture does not do it enough justice. the material is good the clip and zipper are good no problems so far, and i like the feel and casual look about it. its a pretty solid product doesnt fit my mod with a 100ml but for sure no problems with smaller sizes my mod is pretty bulky on its own so thats not the fault of the product
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN JKRS B 1

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly as big as I'd like (my vape is big) but my vape will fit tightly with a smaller, thin e-juice bottle. I do like the little pocket on the front! It let's me keep a spare coil & glass tank replacement jic! I just can't fit extra batteries in their but that's ok, it's still extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Aegis Geek Vape
customer_reviews.text: The case fits my aegis geek vape with room for a slim vape bottle. Just wish it had some foam inside to protect it a little better. I’m a snowmobiled and ride the dunes in a sand rail so it will get Jarred around quit a bit and feel more protection would be better. For an average traveler it’s just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA O.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This does it all! I use it to take my supplies to work...I fit a 50ml bottle of liquid, 2 vape pens, 3 spare batteries and 2 tanks with a little room left over in it.
customer_reviews.author: TLK

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to hold his vape mod and juice because he’s always just carrying it around in his hand, and I think it’s ridiculous. He loves it. He uses the strap to hold it on his shoulder but loves the carabiner and belt holder options. It fits everything with room to spare and is secure.
customer_reviews.author: rachelrosina

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. It took me about 5 months to finally write a review. This thing is like a tank. It’s held up through so much. I searched through so many cases on amazon and stumbled upon this one. We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a case for my belt but this is a little too large so I can’t use it. Finding a perfect case to fit my pod and juice plus wear on my belt is no easy feat. This is a very nice case but just won’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Veey good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is of a very good quality, i wish it was a little bigger or at least with expandable option to accommodate more juice or any other vape accessories
customer_reviews.author: Moshoosh

customer_reviews.title: Case
customer_reviews.text: Case was just the right fit for my vapor. Came in excellent condition too. Measure your vapor top to bottom, side to side before ordering. Can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Great Vapor mod Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great Pouch for my Tarot Nano Vapor. The clip is sturdy and the stiching on the bag is great, the zippers are great quality as well. I would recommend people will Vapor mods get this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great case if you travel a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I can put my TF-V12 and my Alien mod in it no problem. Plenty of room for batteries and a spare tank. Better tann keeping my vape in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I wanted, but good quality so I'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: As described. Fits a 4 battery mod with tank attached.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Just barely fits my 4 battery mod and tank. Might be able to fit a 10 ml bottle alongside the mod.
customer_reviews.author: Robert hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great case but feels slightly bulky
customer_reviews.text: The case has so much pading need a lot less to create room and flexebility when place in your belt loop. Sittin down nakes you fill there is a big pouch on your side
customer_reviews.author: Anabelle Zara-Verosil

customer_reviews.title: Room for everything.
customer_reviews.text: My eLeaf iStick and a 30mL juice bottle fit perfectly in the main pouch. Plenty of room for my charger cable in the mesh pocket. Exterior pocket is big enough for a second tank, smaller juice bottle, or my adapter. So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Vape Pen Case💨🍉🍓
customer_reviews.text: The case is amazing to put my vape pen and the juice inside💨 I could use it for organization instead of making a mess either in my small backpack or a handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I can organize my sling bag now I can't put the bag inside the front pocket of my sling bag and I won't get worried about spilled juice.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's to bulky for a handbag
customer_reviews.text: It was far to bulky as I wanted to put it in my handbag not attach it to my belt!
customer_reviews.author: Suenanna

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It fits everything I need on a daily basis including a phone. Its durable and holds up. I do a lot of farm work and some construction so it can also take a beating and still protect everything within. Thanks. Its just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Bollmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my vape pen, cores and tubes of fluid Exactly what I was looking for and exactly what was delivered. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke off
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke off two weeks after use. Expensive to begin with for somethign so cheap and small - Definietly did not expect it to break.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy vape case!
customer_reviews.text: The vape case fit my mod perfectly, and with the buckle and straps I have different carrying options!
customer_reviews.author: Mizani Anderson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, high quality and perfect for keeping all vape supplies in one place. Great for travel!
customer_reviews.author: R. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, elegant but small, yet I will give u 5 stars for it and it's made with care.
customer_reviews.author: AbuOdeh1

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can keep my vape and juice with me, and I have left the case in the sun and my vape had not overheated or anything out of the sorts, very durable, and I love having the adjustable strap
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Bausch

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality case, holds a variety of ejuice bottles and accessories for on the go vaping which is what I wanted it for. Love the 3 ways to carry: strap, on a belt, or use the carabiner. Love this case!!
customer_reviews.author: Zavcat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but if it little bigger it will be great
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: It will definitely fit in here without the tank sticking out
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vape mod case there is. This is the only one that actually fits my big vape mod. It also has padding so your mod won't get broken. This is worth the money for sure. If your looking for a great case get this one. It's awesome. Very happy with it. This is also the 3rd time I’ve bought it. I have a crazy job and I ripped it catching it on something.
customer_reviews.author: Inspectorx

customer_reviews.title: Great product with lots of room for all vaping needs.
customer_reviews.text: Love how much this holds and how conveint it is.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Fits both of my mods or 1 mod and a 100 ml bottle

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Holds your vape and a 60 ml juice bottle. Nice material, keeps dust out very well.

customer_reviews.title: Received as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Quick shipping and happy with the product..

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case!! Very sturdy and rugged and I love it. Great quality fabric and zippers and all around a great case. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I needed a case for my Joytech Ego Aio, along with space to store liquid and accessories. This one fits the bill perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Worth the money. Able to keep all spare batteries and coil in one location with my vape

customer_reviews.title: Large vapes will leak
customer_reviews.text: Very good and strong but large vapes that never leak will leak in here

customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need it to . Holds vape upright and holds my liquid as well

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome roomy vape case
customer_reviews.text: I have an awkward yihi g class mini qith cloud beast king so its kinda big...fits perfectly..

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps my mind at ease about keeping my vape safe.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Came early which is a plus, really love it thank you

customer_reviews.title: It’s great take 2 juicy and vape
customer_reviews.text: I use for my vape it’s big to take 2 juice

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Wick & Wire.
customer_reviews.text: A great case. It fits very well with the Arizer Solo 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a case to hold his vapes on the go! This was perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great case to keep your vape and juices secure! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the case. It holds my vape and two juices. Has a great loop for the belt, a shoulder strap, & a dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Room

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, but not the size I wanted. Can just about fit a mod and an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal
customer_reviews.text: Was a little late shipping but otherwise I have no complaints. Great case and great deal
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Silva

customer_reviews.title: Traveling Blues No More
customer_reviews.text: OMG! If I knew how great having a carrying case for my vape supplies were, I would have bought this a long time ago. I never knew before how convenient and easy it was to have something that could carry my large vape and vape oil. I can fit that old Aspire NX75 and Smok Qbox with a bottle of vape oil. That NX75 with its tank can be pretty tall and this case fit it easily. FINALLY! A quality case, great zippers that glide well, and a convenient strap that disconnects, and traveling with some of my vape gear is exactly what I needed! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Allawas

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality! Must have for events!
customer_reviews.text: - 3 different carrying options: Belt loop, Carabiner, Lanyard - Holds everything you need for your vape: Vape, 30m Liquid Container, Batteries, Charger. All at once! - Can hold my vape (SMOK G-Priv 2) and iPhone 8 at the same time. - Machine Washable! If you're wondering about size, its the same height and width as an iPhone 8 but 3 times its depth.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: This case is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case to slip on a belt loop for work. While it's a little bit bulky it's not in the way when you move to work on something. The middle part zips up and there is a side little pocket that velcros. If you wear a leatherman you can slip that in the side pocket. There is plenty of room for everything. It's absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cbear

customer_reviews.title: Well built and definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This pouch works good to hold my rig, along with spare batteries and a smaller juice bottle. Also seems well built. Will definitely recommend the brand to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gallmeier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: My husband was carrying around his pen and cartridges in a small canvas bag. He's broken many pens this way. This is perfect to keep everything secure and safe. Seems very well made and has lots of options for carrying- purse style, belt loop or clip to a backpack. It's also small enough to fit in a purse. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewPro2000

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little case for on the go. Bought for an upcoming music festival. Plenty of room for device and bottle of liquid. Could also use for power pack.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel pouch for my vape stuff. Holds all that I need. I did go down to a 30ml bottle and the fit is much better. No problems with the zip, very smooth. Great pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Smok Mag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Boyfriend carries his vape (Smok Mag) in it whenever we leave the house. Gives you peace of mind, keeping your vape safe and sanitary. Very useful. Cheers~
customer_reviews.author: Scoob

customer_reviews.title: Easy carry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for small items when hiking. Easy open and easier to carry.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for carrying around your mod and extra parts.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Vapes case that keeps my mod, juices and battery’s all together. I primarily use it in my car armrest to keep all my pieces together.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful definitely worth it, helps me not forget it at work or anywhere else

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and simple
customer_reviews.text: I like this case. Feels good, is awesome. Organizes all vape stuff really well. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: perfect little storage case for all my odds and ends for my vape pen. Until my puppy got ahold of it.

customer_reviews.title: Vape case
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product it holds my Vape and juice, it does exactly what I need it to do..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pouch for a good sized vape tool and accessories.

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the small side but not bad a design. Belt loop Is a plus as is shoulder strap. The bag also seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband. He uses this for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He uses this for to keep his mod and supplies while at work. He loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Smok G-Priv and Smok T-Priv perfectly. Also fits a 30ml Juice. LOVE IT! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: Great soft Day Trip travel case with ample padding. Exactly what I wanted; easily holds my BoxMod with attached 22mm tank , 30ml glass bottle, 18650 battery in a silicone sleeve, charge cable, spare tank and extra coils + a tiny bit more (probably a skinny phone too). All fully enclosed and shielded from the elements. The case stows, attaches and hangs anywhere that I require. Open case fits in my car's center console and the mod is easily accessed without looking.
customer_reviews.author: Camano

customer_reviews.title: Good pouch for my g-priv 2 mod
customer_reviews.text: This puch is good for a vape mod and can also hold a 40ml bottle and another atomizer tank in the front velcro pouch..price is on the high side though or would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vape Case for Travel – Secure, Organized, Premium Vape Bag – Fits Any Mechanical Box Mods, e-Juice, Battery, Tank Holder & Accessories - Wick and Wire (Primo Black/Suede)
feature_bullets: Designed by Wick & Wire in California

KEEP YOUR VAPE KIT SECURE – Going out? Don’t forget to bring your Wick and Wire Primo vape carrying case with you. It’s the only way to keep your vape gear secure and organized, so no worries about it getting scratched, wet or broken!

FUNCTION MEETS FASHION – Our slick black vape mod holder adds a cool style to your look. Combine with Reinforced Stitching and Heavy-Duty Nylon, you have a highly functional vape travel case for box mods, ejuice and more.

KEEP IT HANDY – Wick and Wire portable vape organizer can be clipped onto a belt loop or your backpack with the carabiner included in the vaping travel kit. You can also sling the vape pouch over your shoulder using the adjustable lanyard.

FITS ALL YOUR GEAR – Like a fanny pack for vape accessories. The spacious interior fits a 30 ml bottle of e-juice, batteries, wicks and wires, and a variety of mods like Smok, Kangertech, Vaporesso, VooPoo, Eleaf and Innokin. Inside netting and loop slings will hold everything securely in place.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We know how expensive vape gear can be, that's why we’ve made this vape pen case with the highest quality zippers and materials. Our branded vape holster is built to last! If for any reason you're not completely satisfied, simply return it within 30 days of delivery for a full, no questions asked, refund.
